A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The ending is amazing and there are lots of great sequences and battles. However the humor is far too jokey and goofy for my taste. Star Wars has been fun in the past but only occasionally funny\, this movie made jokes and did silly gags far too often. One of the plot lines is as far as I can tell useless to the overarching story; that's OK if the characters can carry the scenes and make it entertaining enough\, however in this case the characters are not up to the challenge.
